greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(1) = 0, a(2n) = n, a(2n+1) = a(A305422(2n+1)).
comment: This is GF(2)[X] analog of A246277.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
Index entries for sequences operating on GF(2)[X]-polynomials
program: A305422(n) = { my(f = subst(lift(factor(Pol(binary(n))*Mod(1, 2))),x,2)); for(i=1,#f~,f[i,1] = Pol(binary(A305419(f[i,1])))); fromdigits(Vec(factorback(f))%2,2); };
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 10 2018
